00068       return binContent(binIndex(xOverflowBinIndex(),biny_i));
00069     }

00072       return binContent(binIndex(xUnderflowBinIndex(),biny_i));

00076       return binContent(binIndex(binx_i,yOverflowBinIndex()));
00077     }

00142     UInt_t nXBinsTotal() const {return xNBins()+2;};

00149   inline UInt_t FloatHistogram2D::binIndex(UInt_t binx_i, UInt_t biny_i) const
00150 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00151     throw(std::range_error)
00152 #endif
00153   {
00154 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00155     xRangeCheck(binx_i);
00156     yRangeCheck(biny_i);
00157 #endif
00158     UInt_t bin_i=binx_i + nXBinsTotal() * biny_i;
00159 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00160     rangeCheck(bin_i);
00161 #endif
00162     return bin_i;
00163   }

00166   inline void FloatHistogram2D::fill(Float_t value_x, Float_t value_y, Float_t weight)
00167 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00168     throw(std::range_error)
00169 #endif
00170   {
00171     UInt_t binx_i=xBinIndex(value_x);
00172     UInt_t biny_i=yBinIndex(value_y);
00173     UInt_t bin_i=binIndex(binx_i,biny_i);
00174 
00175     addToBinContent(bin_i,weight);
00176     addToEntries(weight);
00177   }

00179 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00180   inline void FloatHistogram2D::rangeCheck(UInt_t bin_index) const
00181     throw(std::range_error)
00182   {
00183     if ( bin_index + kNHistogram2DFloats >= (UInt_t) _obj->getNFloat() ) {
00184       std::stringstream message;
00185       message << "Range error accessing bin " << bin_index << " of histogram " << id() << " which has " << nBinsTotal() << " bins.";
00186       throw std::range_error(message.str());
00187     }
00188   }
00189 
00190   inline void FloatHistogram2D::xRangeCheck(UInt_t binx_i) const
00191     throw(std::range_error)
00192   {
00193     if ( binx_i>xOverflowBinIndex() ) {
00194       std::stringstream message;
00195       message << "x-bin index out of range : " << binx_i << " > " << xOverflowBinIndex() << "  for histogram " << id() << ".";
00196       throw std::range_error(message.str());
00197     }
00198   }
00199 
00200   inline void FloatHistogram2D::yRangeCheck(UInt_t biny_i) const
00201     throw(std::range_error)
00202   {
00203     if ( biny_i>yOverflowBinIndex() ) {
00204       std::stringstream message;
00205       message << "y-bin index out of range : " << biny_i << " > " << yOverflowBinIndex() << "  for histogram " << id() << ".";
00206       throw std::range_error(message.str());
00207     }
00208   }
00209 
00210 #endif

00212   inline void FloatHistogram2D::addToBinContent(UInt_t bin_index, Float_t value)
00213 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00214     throw(std::range_error)
00215 #endif
00216   {
00217 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00218     rangeCheck(bin_index);
00219 #endif
00220     _obj->setFloatVal(bin_index+kNHistogram2DFloats,binContent(bin_index)+value);
00221   }

00225 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00226     throw(std::range_error)
00227 #endif
00228   {
00229 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00230     rangeCheck(bin_index);
00231 #endif
00232     _obj->setFloatVal(bin_index+kNHistogram2DFloats,value);
00233   }

00235   inline Float_t FloatHistogram2D::binContent(UInt_t bin_index) const
00236 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00237     throw(std::range_error)
00238 #endif
00239   {
00240 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00241     rangeCheck(bin_index);
00242 #endif
00243     return _obj->getFloatVal(bin_index+kNHistogram2DFloats);
00244   }

00246   inline Float_t  FloatHistogram2D::yOverflow() const
00247   {
00248     Double_t overflow=0.;
00249     for (UInt_t binx_i=xFirstBinIndex(); binx_i<=xLastBinIndex(); binx_i++) {
00250       overflow += yOverflow(binx_i);
00251     }
00252     return overflow;
00253   }
00254 
00255   inline Float_t  FloatHistogram2D::yUnderflow() const
00256   {
00257     Double_t underflow=0.;
00258     for (UInt_t binx_i=xFirstBinIndex(); binx_i<=xLastBinIndex(); binx_i++) {
00259       underflow += yOverflow(binx_i);
00260     }
00261     return underflow;
00262   }
00263 
00264   inline Float_t  FloatHistogram2D::xOverflow() const
00265   {
00266     Double_t overflow=0.;
00267     for (UInt_t biny_i=yFirstBinIndex(); biny_i<=yLastBinIndex(); biny_i++) {
00268       overflow += xOverflow(biny_i);
00269     }
00270     return overflow;
00271   }
00272 
00273   inline Float_t  FloatHistogram2D::xUnderflow() const
00274   {
00275     Double_t underflow=0.;
00276     for (UInt_t biny_i=yFirstBinIndex(); biny_i<=yLastBinIndex(); biny_i++) {
00277       underflow += xUnderflow(biny_i);
00278     }
00279     return underflow;
00280   }
